channel.title: My auto login First script so just take a look
channel.description:
[code]program New; var Login, Existing ,x ,y :Integer; Const Username = 'User Name Here'; Password = 'Pass Here'; begin Existing := BitmapFromString(103, 19, 'z78DABD9A4B6EC3300C4' + '4AF54D84ADA2E53B4B9FF910AC45ED0183D7A28B9CD820814EA63' + '73321C516A4B6BEDA7A9FD688F5BDB2DB5A8FF777BDE1EBBD55FC' + '3F7DBFDF67E5F377BE8B5D93897FE4A1656B83ED6AFD676FBB33E' + 'DB67A3A736EC36C23EDAB2AEEBD76EEFEB477B3BD8AD3DCCBB7F8' + 'FBFAA8DAB55AB33D23855EBAC4D57E8F8BF7C3AA8505C11BAA27D' + '8D73408EF652E4504B6CD79538563076C1988AE10D3FD16A14087' + 'B6A371FC595624CECF2B93C96E7054833E6EAAC939E37B43B9C10' + '6314B9081989C64C2335157D425A1C9FFE415574E95B15B6B4109' + '84750FBE6F1AD622F8E46CC9CA2BA8AED327288AFFC386A3E75B2' + '15653D679C7C3D0ECB69DE948C4C16B197E753C2956F0DCC54315' + '6B511933EC69EC6C7C289A3F77CF558652A477D81A2231FF2A437' + 'D019C7CF50AAFAAAD8B3796926236B5F5F6F4744BDA59F3C9A65D' + '5AD2C015C74C0BCAFB2F208429624EE2A3C976FF56D8C21D0C889' + 'D7F258B43348CB75518719142146C6F4E3D8592130613EE63E6FC' + '4D8D08E15B32729B1FFB1B44F19D260BEFF8912F39166EB2EF5A7' + 'FCEBE0218E798234996B905B6055273997109573E6447EC42C7C6' + 'D6DC4E0340B69C0181D6CBCFCB7F74359ECD02E731DF26F683F51' + '8680A25C3DC6B9B6F79FCFA235877C46DC2F48C40FBD027F1EDA8' + '5E14F562BD1FF0BCFC22EC3D1698013D566BAB3A035ABA223DC56' + '9561EEDFE1B4F07FA7753AFE71166B7F14F0A6E32896F276FA289' + '2699DB41EED35C3728A2EAA7BE4D993F6B0B8E69065F2917DA6A2' + '42150EEA27859B1292C5727D4EB55C556B9A0BA81DABC472BA449' + 'E3A66ECEBB4AB16CA751DD654635CD227CD6774FCAD5E0115CE2E' + '80B227E5D62AD2AC5B3DCE39A3DC21C13A95739E553D811AAB04C' + 'z78DABD5A4B6EEB3010BB526' + '0CB79ED3245EBFB1FE901911723D0A438925A2F0681228FEDA138' + '3FE9781EFF9EFBF196E5BB9CC7AB911FE575944BE2BF4CC6BBB65' + '2CA4F95FB6BFF2AE5923FFB593EE3BF5959355CDAB67DDFBF2EF9' + 'DC3FCAA391753C3CF7FA1DFF4519DF16253E91E9C94AE7DDE00D1' + 'BCB6B04E3882F01C1053A71855474A28C36D7C8A2AC7310354410' + 'E4F6B9BDB673018EC6B3E27BA21DA66CCB708CFAABFDE7B1438C8' + '0E916BED23E37F722CA525B07D9A88D7915B966AA44FB74FC18F3' + '878E1E8D91C350F4A8E0AB99A4C86A4FCB50F3A58148164194D4F' + 'E1A17C2913166D1A84722299BC366B27578A347F385AD9C316481' + '5333BE3A914BE00A273C3AC395886EDA3EC47F32DE25BECB97688' + 'D317C0D6F998DAA163B92568A383EDE1763B1D6793D37223894E5' + '52BFCA22E0DF48967DD93CF571F4AD1D91EAE0C8EC99E50579AB8' + 'E37664FD47C9FF09CD43F2FAD566E6A0D5D0FEAC8C8F8A859CF22' + '14E69F5005686F19DF2491B506EE2772A75FC3C8C2D1C9301D866' + 'A1C65843AC9C5224E673E58FB112E7CC31B3DD53E4E96EB70D6C7' + 'D4AF1C514644B21CB4E323FB6A9C59AF1B1EF9F3830763AB02B1B' + 'BD103D562C793643D30E28B9E4762DA444FA74277F025F92AE3A3' + '66EEFC38C3BD7EB5B31EE2FC9BCEDEAA7C8978486766D30770FA3' + '9C91E1A8D8FF6CCC47816DFF737FAF8FA39FC825C2832CBC031A2' + 'D9E99E0DF5D02C1C6546348F63968F0C5FDD2B5E56B320A6C98E9' + '046907A5D99179DC61535B3394D7E42D06777D5AF4EF091CDFFCB' + '8A7228C3B9F8587DA6512D7622298C3C8CCB99CFD64C27AE059B3' + '06D713CB2A01967765ED50798998F7D00A32F7D93D3EA3DCAA11C' + 'C9CF8AAD0C59E7FCB8D7A0771F9855F5CC31DC1D9493FD9C866BF' + 'E6EB2BFD76CF706FD7A2451A1637F4CFB3A1DDD9CDD8AB59194E1' + 'B8162F9F89B2C3968DA71D3BEB2C85718AF4781319E62FC4CA98A' + 'FD2731DF3673C92ECF3258BA70D0A9A65DAFE78177478684F4057' + '167EDF005720D19640611AB5A93339FE9E978C3589BBF41C3FABC' + 'CF65A9DC88EE7731C8F97CD6DE4299DA9731D495E7718E7D480FE' + '799EB5E7AC929AD35CD0DCF4ED3CD3FDC3F339A4FF9940567B600' + '74D9FAD8EFF4CEAECAC73E2C712676FF0DFB14A449E915B767E12' + 'F0B2F63BD69ED51962F77FC5AD5D22'); If (findbitmap (Exsiting, x, y)) then MoveMouseSmooth(x,y); If (findbitmap (Exsiting, x, y)) then ClickMouse(x,y,true); Wait(1000) If (findbitmap (Login, x, y)) then Sendkeys (Username + chr(13) + Password); Wait(1000) If (findbitmap (Login, x, y)) then MoveMouseSmooth(x,y); If (findbitmap (Login, x, y)) then ClickMouse(x,y,true);
end. [/code]
It just basically Looks for the existing user button and log-in button and clicks them and types in your pass ext..
This is useful cause other log-in scripts I've seen just type your user name and pass risking you might hit the hot key and type it in someone like runescape but for this one , If it cant find the image it wont type the pass

item.title: My auto login First script so just take a look
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

Nice, try cropping the bitmap in the future though. I believe there are tutorials for bitmaps where you can find out how to do this (im too lazy to explain now)

Read full topic
item.source: My auto login First script so just take a look

item.title: My auto login First script so just take a look
item.dc:creator: @Wolfeyes217 Wolfeyes217
item.description:
@Wolfeyes217 wrote:

[code]program New;
var Login, Existing ,x ,y :Integer;
Const
Username = ‘User Name Here’;
Password = ‘Pass Here’;
begin
Existing := BitmapFromString(103, 19, ‘z78DABD9A4B6EC3300C4’ +
‘4AF54D84ADA2E53B4B9FF910AC45ED0183D7A28B9CD820814EA63’ +
‘73321C516A4B6BEDA7A9FD688F5BDB2DB5A8FF777BDE1EBBD55FC’ +
‘3F7DBFDF67E5F377BE8B5D93897FE4A1656B83ED6AFD676FBB33E’ +
‘DB67A3A736EC36C23EDAB2AEEBD76EEFEB477B3BD8AD3DCCBB7F8’ +
‘FBFAA8DAB55AB33D23855EBAC4D57E8F8BF7C3AA8505C11BAA27D’ +
‘8D73408EF652E4504B6CD79538563076C1988AE10D3FD16A14087’ +

‘15653D679C7C3D0ECB69DE948C4C16B197E753C2956F0DCC54315’ +
‘6B511933EC69EC6C7C289A3F77CF558652A477D81A2231FF2A437’ +
‘D019C7CF50AAFAAAD8B3796926236B5F5F6F4744BDA59F3C9A65D’ +
‘5AD2C015C74C0BCAFB2F208429624EE2A3C976FF56D8C21D0C889’ +
‘D7F258B43348CB75518719142146C6F4E3D8592130613EE63E6FC’ +
‘4D8D08E15B32729B1FFB1B44F19D260BEFF8912F39166EB2EF5A7’ +
‘FCEBE0218E798234996B905B6055273997109573E6447EC42C7C6’ +
‘D6DC4E0340B69C0181D6CBCFCB7F74359ECD02E731DF26F683F51’ +
‘8680A25C3DC6B9B6F79FCFA235877C46DC2F48C40FBD027F1EDA8’ +
‘5E14F562BD1FF0BCFC22EC3D1698013D566BAB3A035ABA223DC56’ +
‘9561EEDFE1B4F07FA7753AFE71166B7F14F0A6E32896F276FA289’ +

‘B26975B48058F9D78C71949F5F88C7C62AB70EC636FC201E421CF’ +
‘DEC19F1768234D97790BFB36729F4BD0A81A4D3441739D9B3539D’ +
‘4B11EE64DB1D0F34AF5315C94FDCF434CA465ACE57968601254F5’ +
‘13BF93FA6D97606A56359CC8914C517F35791A37C66A31D41E4D8’ +

‘73CCD02D20FAD53ED18EB7922CB4E73791864E45F39D45AE39AD7’ +
‘B14F9CD0A8A7BEE39864C0787D573CF5CA7E57730AEE23DFF4C61’ +
‘8C7B8BB7984EEE9E89B62FE825AADEEB1901C5343F11706E62CC3’ +
‘3E1C4EDCAC2BDA0F9983A9C7915A2C6D620E74AB8733494640709’ +
‘C6A941AEE5ACF3FA798C0DDDD640B4BF5A7E01906E322A’);
login := BitmapFromString(76, 24, ‘z78DABD5A4B6EEB3010BB526’ +
‘0CB79ED3245EBFB1FE901911723D0A438925A2F0681228FEDA138’ +
‘3FE9781EFF9EFBF196E5BB9CC7AB911FE575944BE2BF4CC6BBB65’ +

‘0E916BED23E37F722CA525B07D9A88D7915B966AA44FB74FC18F3’ +
‘878E1E8D91C350F4A8E0AB99A4C86A4FCB50F3A58148164194D4F’ +
‘E1A17C2913166D1A84722299BC366B27578A347F385AD9C316481’ +
‘5333BE3A914BE00A273C3AC395886EDA3EC47F32DE25BECB97688’ +
‘D317C0D6F998DAA163B92568A383EDE1763B1D6793D37223894E5’ +
‘52BFCA22E0DF48967DD93CF571F4AD1D91EAE0C8EC99E50579AB8’ +
‘E37664FD47C9FF09CD43F2FAD566E6A0D5D0FEAC8C8F8A859CF22’ +
‘14E69F5005686F19DF2491B506EE2772A75FC3C8C2D1C9301D866’ +
‘A1C65843AC9C5224E673E58FB112E7CC31B3DD53E4E96EB70D6C7’ +
‘D4AF1C514644B21CB4E323FB6A9C59AF1B1EF9F3830763AB02B1B’ +
‘BD103D562C793643D30E28B9E4762DA444FA74277F025F92AE3A3’ +
‘66EEFC38C3BD7EB5B31EE2FC9BCEDEAA7C8978486766D30770FA3’ +
‘9C91E1A8D8FF6CCC47816DFF737FAF8FA39FC825C2832CBC031A2’ +
‘D9E99E0DF5D02C1C6546348F63968F0C5FDD2B5E56B320A6C98E9’ +
‘046907A5D99179DC61535B3394D7E42D06777D5AF4EF091CDFFCB’ +
‘8A7228C3B9F8587DA6512D7622298C3C8CCB99CFD64C27AE059B3’ +
‘06D713CB2A01967765ED50798998F7D00A32F7D93D3EA3DCAA11C’ +
‘C9CF8AAD0C59E7FCB8D7A0771F9855F5CC31DC1D9493FD9C866BF’ +
‘E6EB2BFD76CF706FD7A2451A1637F4CFB3A1DDD9CDD8AB59194E1’ +
‘B8162F9F89B2C3968DA71D3BEB2C85718AF4781319E62FC4CA98A’ +
‘FD2731DF3673C92ECF3258BA70D0A9A65DAFE78177478684F4057’ +
‘167EDF005720D19640611AB5A93339FE9E978C3589BBF41C3FABC’ +
‘CF65A9DC88EE7731C8F97CD6DE4299DA9731D495E7718E7D480FE’ +
‘799EB5E7AC929AD35CD0DCF4ED3CD3FDC3F339A4FF9940567B600’ +
‘74D9FAD8EFF4CEAECAC73E2C712676FF0DFB14A449E915B767E12’ +
‘F0B2F63BD69ED51962F77FC5AD5D22’);
If (findbitmap (Exsiting, x, y)) then
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y);
If (findbitmap (Exsiting, x, y)) then
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
Wait(1000)
If (findbitmap (Login, x, y)) then
Sendkeys (Username + chr(13) + Password);
Wait(1000)
If (findbitmap (Login, x, y)) then
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y);
If (findbitmap (Login, x, y)) then
ClickMouse(x,y,true);

end.
[/code]

It just basically Looks for the existing user button and log-in button and clicks them and types in your pass ext…

This is useful cause other log-in scripts I’ve seen just type your user name and pass risking you might hit the hot key and type it in someone like runescape but for this one , If it cant find the image it wont type the pass

Read full topic
